entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers late in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local snowfall amount 2 cm.
